channel.title: How Do I get people on to my DeltaScape 317 (Read Description) *Server Error*
channel.description:
Ok on my Deltascape 317's login page. It asks for the Username and Password and Server IP (which I put the No-IP) and port (43594)
so I have another PC In my house and ran the client on it and put in the same server IP and it didnt login
It said "error connecting to server"
What must I do on my client.java file in my server/source folder? I changed all the 127.0.0.1 to my No-Ip address.
[b][u]The BELOW PICTURE[/u][/b] is of a different type of server, mine asks for IP and Port, and the picture below doesn't but its the same problem "Error Connecting to Server"
[img]http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSPCjfcNBPtvD0Dwmshr2i_yiDaWex8CQuRC6ZfO7-hmnSXafDahenEOr_l2w[/img]

item.title: How Do I get people on to my DeltaScape 317 (Read Description) *Server Error*
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Sarah he already did that! well you may have to change them back to 127.0.0.1 for you login

@Fly you got skype? if so add me occeannomic

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I get people on to my DeltaScape 317 (Read Description) *Server Error*
item.dc:creator: @_sarah1 _sarah_
item.description:
@_sarah1 wrote:

change all the 127.0.0.1 in ur client to your no-ip
then run the server and try to login with the client from another pc
if that doesn’t work try a no-biz instead of no-ip

Read full topic

item.description:

In my client.java i replaced all the 127.0.0.1 with my No-Ip Url, is this correct?

Should I also replace the 127.0.0.1 in the server.java file?

item.title: How Do I get people on to my DeltaScape 317 (Read Description) *Server Error*
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

You change the ip in the client whereever there is a server = (no matter what file its in) change it to your no-ip, then compile it and try getting on on another computer

use a program called zfilesearch

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I get people on to my DeltaScape 317 (Read Description) *Server Error*
item.dc:creator: @Fly4Fantasy Fly4Fantasy
item.description:
@Fly4Fantasy wrote:

Yup

It says --------> Success: I can see your service on (My Official IP Address)

Your ISP is not blocking port 43594

Excellent Website by the way, thanks for sharing, and maybe it’s something with my client or my client.java file in server/source folder

Read full topic
